function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact on community planning model due to non-contact interaction activities under the influence of COVID-19.","Impact":"Reconfigured organization mechanisms of community space, affecting accessibility of facilities and service radius.","Mitigation":"Include pedestrian scale factors and spatial scale changes in community planning, utilize non-contact interaction technologies, and allocate community service facilities and public space more flexibly.","Technologies":"Non-contact interaction technologies, intelligent community composite space.","People":"Community residents, urban planners, public health officials.","Owner":"Urban planners, community developers, local government."}]}
